pages.title: Reversing Hoe
pages.text: This tool can be used to reverse the state of certain blocks, alongside being used as a regular hoe. $(br2)See the next few pages for further details. $(br2)Also, it cannot be repaired in an anvil.
Using Stable Ingots will yield a special enchantment, alongside making the tool unbreakable.

pages.title: Crops
pages.text: Any crop that is clicked with this hoe will regress it to a previous state. $(br2)The crop must have the $(br)'forge:crops' tag for this to work.
